title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements through stakeholder interviews and market research.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including data models, algorithms, and integration with external services. The architecture should consider scalability, maintainability, and performance. Identify potential data sources and APIs for socioeconomic and educational data. Define the core prediction algorithms and machine learning models to be used. Outline the user interface and experience flow.

title: Data Collection and Processing
description: Identify and acquire relevant socioeconomic, educational, and career data sources, and design data processing pipelines.

title: Predictive Modeling
description: Develop and train machine learning models to predict social mobility outcomes based on input factors.

title: User Interface Design for SocialMobilityNavigator
description: Design an intuitive, user-friendly, and accessible interface that allows users to input their information, including education history, career goals, and socioeconomic factors, and receive personalized recommendations. The design should prioritize usability, accessibility, and data privacy.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement a secure, scalable, and high-performance database system to store user data, predictions, socioeconomic factors, and other relevant information. The database should support efficient data retrieval, analysis, and reporting. Ensure data privacy and compliance with relevant regulations.

title: Security and Privacy Considerations
description: Implement robust security measures and ensure compliance with data privacy regulations.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and execute thorough testing to ensure the application's reliability and accuracy.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the infrastructure and automate the deployment process for the application.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation for users, developers, and administrators, and establish support channels.
